Description.Text: Svet Mayaka is a friendly 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in southwest St Petersburg. Highlights include onsite dining, a traditional spa, free Wi-Fi and parking and a complimentary airport shuttle. Strelna is a former royal summer residence situated on the shore of Neva Bay in southwest St Petersburg. Regional places of interest include UNESCO World Heritage Site Constantine Palace, the Coastal Monastery of St. Sergius and Znamenka Palace. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to central St Petersburg. The hotel occupies two low-rise buildings, one a grand, traditional property featuring an elegant, yellow facade. Facilities include a swimming pool, sauna, steam room and traditional spa offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 22-28sqm and simply decorated in pastel colours with classic furniture design. They are located in both hotel buildings. Amenities include a TV, fridge and a work desk. Most rooms have air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower, slippers and complimentary toiletries. The hotel cafe serves traditional European cuisine and a range of drinks throughout the day, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a complimentary airport shuttle service.
